trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Grand Prairie
There were no other sightings in Grand Prairie on or around September 30th 1982
Summary: Nine objects of varying sizes, shapes and colors moved at fast speeds in geometrical patterns in the clear night sky over our school They stopped traffic on I-30 in both directions.
divs: sighting detailswell gosh this was many years ago. i have told many people about this though, over the years. i am 36 now. we had just finished our fall sock hop at adams middle school in grand prairie, tx and were all standing outside waiting for our parents. teachers, students, and administrators were all present and witnessed this event in mass. we were standing there when we realized there were lights dancing rapidly in the sky making odd patterns around what seemed a central light. it went on for about 20 minutes total and moved perhaps 5000 meters in every direction. the colors of the spheres were orange,red, blue, and the central object was white and oval\cylindrical in shape. the lights did not pulsate, but they did seem to phase in and out in vibrancy as they moved around, and i had the sense there was some sort of communication going on. we were all terrified. the principal at the time kept looking around to find spotlights or something to explain it, and he could find nothing to explain it. we were all dumbfounded. we looked over at the highway, i-30, which is visable from the school (it was a four lane then), and traffic had aalmost stopped dead, but their lights were on... it was like looking at rubber necking at the scene of an accident. people were pulled over on the side of the road watching the sky. the objects were obviously very high in the atmosphere, as you could not hear anything from them at all. i knew the area very well as i lived in the apartments across the highway, and was very familar with the night sky in the location. the spheres moved around forming odd cross patterns, and geometric (circles, stars, flowers, triangles) patterns, and then four of them attached to the central object and the others zipped away, and then the large object zipped off, and at the same moment we felt an odd wave of sudden static electricity. i had very long hair, and i had serious static cling out of nowhere, as my felt skirt was stuck tight to my leggings, as were all the other girls. we were all affected. another odd thing i remember was seeing what seemed like spurts of glowing orange "spits" when the four went in to the larger object. a few minutes after they took off we saw fighter jets doing circles around the area. there were also a few helicopters in the air looking for something on the ground with spotlights. the following day the principal came on the announcements and told us not to worry about anything, that it was a beautiful light show, and nothing more, and to dismiss it. i volunteered in the office, and there were air force officers there that morning. at the time i called around everywhere in the metroplex and there were no light shows of any kind in the metroplex. i also called the media stations to see if anything had surfaced in the news, and nothing had. i was a very determined child and my parents had witnessed it to from the appartments before picking me up. i should add here that i am former air force intell. i am also highly educated, and am naturally a skeptic. i am also a former archaeologist, and am detail oriented. i am convinced beyond a resonable doubt that what i witnessed that day was not a man-made or natural occurance. all of the children of our school felt that we had witnessed a ufo sighting. it is the only event of this kind i have had. thank you for your time.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
